func TestSliceCompare(t *testing.T){
	var a []int   
	var b = make([]int,0,0)  
	c := []int{}  
	t.Log(a, len(a), cap(a))
	t.Log(b, len(b), cap(b))
	t.Log(c, len(c), cap(c))
	t.Log(a==nil, b==nil, c==nil)
}

}

4ã€æ€»ç»“ï¼šå®¹é‡å¢å€æ‰©å®¹å…¶å®æ˜¯ç”¨ç©ºé—´æ¢æ—¶é—´ï¼Œå½“é¡ºåºè¡¨ç‰¹åˆ«å¤§çš„æ—¶å€™è¶Šæ¥è¶Šç¨€ç–ï¼Œå®é™…ä¸­æœ€å¥½å…ˆå®¹é‡é¢„ä¼°ï¼Œäº‹å…ˆç”³è¯·è¶³å¤Ÿå¤§çš„å®¹é‡é¡ºåºè¡¨ï¼Œå…å¾—åˆ°æ—¶å€™å‡ºç°å¤§é‡å¤åˆ¶ã€‚

func TestSlice3(t *testing.T) {
	t.Log("--------------------------Slice")
	var slice = make([]int, 1, 3)
	slice[0] = 1
	for i := 0; i < 6; i++ {
		slice = append(slice, i)
	}
	t.Log(len(slice), cap(slice), slice)
	t.Log("--------------------------Slice2")
	var slice2 = make([]int, 1, 3)
	slice2[0] = 1
	slice2 = append(slice2, 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5)
	t.Log(len(slice2), cap(slice2), slice2)
	t.Log("--------------------------Slice3")
	var slice3 = make([]int, 1, 3)
	slice3[0] = 1
	slice3 = append(slice3, 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7)
	t.Log(len(slice3), cap(slice3), slice3)
}
